scripts.docs:clean:stable: rimraf inde***REMOVED***.html && rimraf -rf ./docs/*.html  && rimraf -rf ./docs/api && rimraf -rf ./docs/tutorials/*.html && rimraf -rf ./docs/typescript/*.html && rimraf -rf ./docs/*.html && rimraf -rf ./docs/source/_docs && rimraf -rf ./tmp
scripts.docs:copy:tmp: mkdirp ./tmp/docs/css && mkdirp ./tmp/docs/js && mkdirp ./tmp/docs/images && mkdirp ./tmp/docs/tutorials && mkdirp ./tmp/docs/typescript && mkdirp ./tmp/docs/api && ncp ./docs/css ./tmp/docs/css --filter=.css$ && ncp ./docs/js ./tmp/docs/js --filter=.js$ && ncp ./docs/images ./tmp/docs/images && ncp ./docs/tutorials ./tmp/docs/tutorials && ncp ./docs/typescript ./tmp/docs/typescript && ncp ./docs/api ./tmp/docs/api && cp inde***REMOVED***.html ./tmp && cp docs/*.html ./tmp/docs/
scripts.docs:prepare:publish:stable: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && npm run docs:generate
scripts.docs:prepare:publish:5***REMOVED***: git checkout 5.***REMOVED*** && git merge 5.***REMOVED*** && npm run docs:clean:stable && npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:copy:tmp && git checkout gh-pages && npm run docs:copy:tmp:5***REMOVED***
scripts.docs:prepare:publish:6***REMOVED***: git checkout 6.***REMOVED*** && git merge 6.***REMOVED*** && npm run docs:clean:stable && env DOCS_DEPLOY=true npm run docs:generate && mv ./docs/6.***REMOVED*** ./tmp && git checkout gh-pages && npm run docs:copy:tmp:6***REMOVED***
scripts.docs:prepare:publish:7***REMOVED***: env DOCS_DEPLOY=true npm run docs:generate && git checkout gh-pages && rimraf ./docs/7.***REMOVED*** && mv ./tmp ./docs/7.***REMOVED***
scripts.release: git pull && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-5***REMOVED***: git pull origin 5.***REMOVED*** && git push origin 5.***REMOVED*** && git push origin 5.***REMOVED*** --tags && npm publish --tag 5***REMOVED***
scripts.release-6***REMOVED***: git pull origin 6.***REMOVED*** && git push origin 6.***REMOVED*** && git push origin 6.***REMOVED*** --tags && npm publish --tag 6***REMOVED***
scripts.ts-benchmark: cd ./benchmarks/typescript/simple && npm install && npm run benchmark | node ../../../scripts/tsc-diagnostics-check
